page.title: 28Technology in 2011
page.content:
In 2011 there are lots of new things compared to the 1980's. There are lots more technology like Computers, X box, Nintendo WII, Ds , Ps3 and ps2, 3D Ds, IPODS IPAD 1 and 2 .

Mobile phones

Most kids have a mobile phone so they can keep safe and keep touch with there friends and family. You can get contract phone. Things you can do on a mobile phone: Go on the internet, download music, send messages, play games, Take photos, take video's and ring people.

Televisions

Tv's in 2011 are much better from the 1980's because now you can get colour tv's, 3D tv's lcd, HD TV'S plasma tv's and more Tv programs.

By Tyree Reddie


Class 6 Glade Hill
